opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 1999, the Order of the Superior Court is REVERSED pursuant to Adamski v. Miller, 545 Pa. 316, 681 A.2d 171 (1996). The case is remanded to the trial court for reinstatement of the award of punitive damages.
